name: Cucumber Apple Mint Smoothie
description: This Cucumber Apple Mint Smoothie is like a spa day in a glass. The refreshing cucumber, sweet apple, and zippy mint come together to create a revitalizing drink.
instructions: Place the cucumber, mint, apple, honey, and avocado in a blender or food processor and blend until just combined.
Add in the ice and continue to blend until the mixture is smooth.
